title: Robokon
author: Robokon
created_time: March 26, 2023, 04:13:12 PMLast edit: March 26, 2023, 04:54:28 PM by Robokon
content: Exclude small bugs - Forum Views Counter I don't know if this bug is known already.I have noticed, when I creating a new thread, the views counter goes up if I click on my own topic.Possibly is not a big problem, but influences the correct forum statistics.Conceivable solution with IP or username double-click blocking.

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: You mean on the forum on the engine epochtalk? So on this forum the same situation and for a very long time. No one paid attention to it, if I'm not mistaken. I don't think it's a bug. Otherwise theymos would have fixed it long ago.

comments.author: Robokon
comments.body: Quote from: Xal0lex on March 26, 2023, 05:03:18 PMYou mean on the forum on the engine epochtalk? So on this forum the same situation and for a very long time. No one paid attention to it, if I'm not mistaken. I don't think it's a bug. Otherwise theymos would have fixed it long ago.Yes, that is exactly what I mean. All right if nobody's worried.
